entry.title: [Global][VMwarePrivateCloud] - vCenter major upgrade and and ESXi upgrade

Start time : 20/02/2023 07:00 UTC
End time : 03/03/2023 17:00 UTC

Feb 15, 22:26 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 27/02/2023 07:00 UTC
End time : 03/03/2023 17:00 UTC

Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we are rolling an upgrade for the VMware vCenter Server Appliance solution and ESXi for customers without Zerto service.

entry.title: [RBX8][HostedPrivateCloud] - Racks R808R25 / R808R26 / R808R27
entry.content:
Feb 15, 20:30 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 15/02/2023 19:53 UTC
End Time : 15/02/23 20:30 UTC
Related Incident : [RBX8][Dedicated Servers] - Rack R808R25/R808R26/R808R27
Root cause : Cooling malfunction
Public and vRack network were down on racks R808R25/R808R26/R808R27.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

entry.title: [RBX7][VMwarePrivateCloud] - Datastores unavailable
entry.content:
Feb 6, 08:23 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 06/02/2023 08:02 UTC
End Time : 06/02/2023 08:19 UTC
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Feb 6, 08:19 UTC
Update - Further investigation reported those datastores impacted :
ssd-009229
ssd-010041
ssd-009227
ssd-009235
ssd-009226
ssd-009230
ssd-009234
ssd-009580
ssd-009231
ssd-009381

Feb 6, 08:10 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 06/02/2023 08:02 UTC
Service impact : Datastores on cluster are not available
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [EU/CA/Secnumcloud][Hosted Private Cloud] - vROps
entry.content:
Feb 3, 16:52 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jan 30, 07:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jan 24, 18:15 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 30/01/2023 07:00 UTC 
End time : 03/02/2023 17:00 UTC 
Service impact : vROps unavailable during the upgrade
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we need to upgrade vROps (vRealize Operations) to its last version.
The duration will be one hour per vrom.
Customer can reschedule maintenance.
Customer will be notified by email when the maintenance is scheduled.
